subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Supporting Uruguay seems to be a mix of masochism and nostalgia, and the country’s 3-1 loss to Costa Rica on Saturday will reinforce its fans’ cultured skepticism.
snippet: Supporting Uruguay seems to be a mix of masochism and nostalgia, and the country’s 3-1 loss to Costa Rica on Saturday will reinforce its fans’ cultured skepticism.
